item.title: Portfolio Consolidation & Bond Analysis Automation
item.description: Automated Python workflow consolidating multi-bank holdings with structured fixed-income and equity analysis, delivering faster monthly reporting with improved accuracy.

item.title: Real-Time Liquidity Consolidation System
item.description: Python automation centralizing multi-bank cash balances with pending trade adjustments and unified liquidity reporting for accurate portfolio decisions.

item.title: Monthly Portfolio Snapshot Automation — UBS PDF Statements
item.description: Python workflow parsing UBS account statements to reconstruct end-of-month portfolios and generate pre-filled client emails with portfolio metrics.

item.title: Structured Products Database Integration System
item.description: Consolidated dataset integrating client structured-product transactions with full product attributes for monitoring call events and exposure analysis.

item.title: Weekly Macro Update Automation — Economic Indicators
item.description: Python automation scraping macroeconomic indicators from free public sources for consistent weekly internal macro reporting.
